name: innovAgile
description:
InnovAgile have been supporting startup and mid-size customers in their product development by providing high quality software development services.
We employ highly educated software engineers who deliver quality code based on sound architecture.
We support our partners by delivering software in an iterative way, which allows them to adjust to ever-changing business environments. We work very closely and communicate effectively with our partners in order to fullfil their business needs.
